name: The Gatekeeper
description:
The Gatekeeper Description:

The Gatekeeper is a arcade-casual game made for the Flyover Indies Learning Jam.  In the game you have to protect the Castle door destroying all the foes. Try to beat your Highscore!

Controlls:

To move the player use the arrows or A & D. Use SPACEBAR to hit the weapon. If the weapon touches the Keeper he will take it, try to avoid this pressing SPACEBAR before this happens. You will earn combo points for each enemy you hit without grabing the weapon.

Browser Issues:

Make sure to go fullscreen if you play on browser, you won't see the score and your HP bar if you don't!!
